attributes.value: Sees life as unfair and doesn't mind it that way
Values tradition
Has a great deal of respect for worthy craftsmanship
Values knowledge
Never feels hatred toward anyone or anything
Is rarely jealous
Dislikes receiving advice, preferring to keep her own counsel
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Is completely wrapped up in her own appearance, abilities and other personal matters
Is not driven and rarely feels the need to pursue even a modest success
Does not generally seek retribution for past wrongs
Is very curious, sometimes to her detriment
Forms strong emotional bonds with others, at times to her detriment
Can sometimes act without deliberation
Tries to keep her things orderly
Lives at a slow-going and leisurely pace
Actively avoids exciting or stressful situations
Clumsy
Flimsy
A stunning lack of analytical ability
A boundless creative imagination
A meager kinesthetic sense
Poor empathy
A great feel for social relationships
